sentence.Network_en: The new model is a testament to the skill and dedication of the workforce.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种新型产品显示了全体员工的技术水平和敬业精神。

sentence.Network_en: Although New Testament apocrypha go into these details, some quite extensively.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管在新约的伪经进一步详细地写这些细节, 一些还写得十分广阔.

sentence.Network_en: The falsification of the testament [ will ] was discovered by them.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们发现这份遗嘱被 窜改 了.

在旧约 (Old Testament), 上帝启示祂自己是自有永有的神. 祂说, 祂, 耶和华是真神, 其他的神, 都是假神; 在新约 (New Testament) 则.
旧约全书（old testament）（Old Testament）据犹太教的说法，旧约全书（old testament）本是犹太人所写。而被基督教抢夺的犹太教义。

the testament succession system of modern westerns embodied the respect the freedom of personal will , and at the same , they made protection of social benefits better .近代西方各国遗嘱继承制度的定型，则体现出在尊重个人意志自由的同时，亦加强了对社会利益的保护。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Latin testamentum 'a will' (from testari 'testify'), in Christian Latin also translating Greek diathēkē 'covenant'

encyclopedia.content: 【摇滚乐队】 Testament（国内通译“圣约”），美国著名的敲击/鞭笞金属（Thrash Metal）摇滚乐队。 国籍：美国 组建时间：1986年 风格： Hardcore（硬核） Heavy Metal（重金属） Speed Metal（速度金属） Thrash（鞭挞金属） 现任阵容 Chuck Billy - Vocals (Legacy, guest for James Murphy, Dublin Death Patrol) Eric Peterson - Guitars (Legacy, Dragonlord) Alex Skolnick - Guitars (Legacy, ex-Savatage, The Skolnick

entry.def: If one thing is a testament to another, it shows that the other thing exists or is true.

example.ex: Braka's house, just off Sloane Square, is a testament to his Gothic tastes...
example.tran: 布拉卡那幢紧靠斯隆广场的房子是他喜好哥特式建筑的一个证据。

example.ex: The fact that these scandals are now public is testament to the relative openness of America's government.
example.tran: 这些丑闻如今公之于众的事实说明了美国政府的相对透明。

entry.tran: 最新遗嘱;（尤指）临终遗嘱,临终遗言
entry.def: Someone's last will and testament is the most recent will that they have made, especially the last will that they make before they die.

means.word_mean: 2. a legal document declaring a person's wishes regarding the disposal of their property when they die

sentences.sentence: "his easy victory was a testament to his skill"

auth_sentence.content: The Complete Jack Johnson Sessions is a fitting testament.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Complete Jack Johnson Sessions is a fitting testament.

auth_sentence.content: That thread stands as a testament to your dishonesty.

sentences.en: This is his last will and testament.
His success is a testament to his skills.
sentences.cn: 他的成功便是他技艺娴熟的证据。
